page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL HIGHLIGHTS The table below lists the contents that have been technically revised in the current revision of this manual. Other revised contents, if any, that do not appear in the table below are considered editorially revised, they having no technical implications. SUBJECT DESCRIPTION PAGE BLOCK 05-30-12/600 Deleted item that was causing confusion to the operator. TASK 05-50-26-200-802-A/600 Improved steps of Mechanical/Electromechanical Gust Lock Inspection TASK 05-50-28-200-801-A/600 Updated scenario on General topic. PAGE BLOCK 20-30-02/200 Added oil (Radcolube NLT) as alternative on Table 203 Added GN148 as alternative on Table 205 PAGE BLOCK 20-30-03/200 Revised table to add alternative product PAGE BLOCK 20-30-04/200 Changed the information of SPEC AMS 1526C according to vendors request (PCR 162897) PAGE BLOCK 20-30-05/200 Added alternative Revised table to include procedure Included alternative consumable TASK 21-00-00-860-801-A/200 Updated procedure related to cooling packs status. TASK 21-00-00-860-803-A/200 Updated procedure related to cooling packs status. TASK 21-00-00-860-804-A/200 Updated procedure related to cooling packs status. TASK 21-20-00-700-801-A/500 Updated procedure for PASS CABIN temperature selec- tor in manual position. TASK 21-51-02-000-801-A/400 Updated task TASK 21-51-02-400-801-A/400 Updated task TASK 21-51-03-000-801-A/400 Revised figure. TASK 21-51-03-400-801-A/400 Updated installation instructions. TASK 21-51-03-210-801-A/600 Updated instructions on follow-on. TASK 21-51-04-000-801-A/400 Revised Figure 402. Revised figure. Editorial update on removal instructions. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 Page 1 of 4 HIGHLIGHTS Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SUBJECT DESCRIPTION TASK 21-51-04-400-801-A/400 Updated procedure to show replacement of the cap, fit- ting and O'ring if applicable to the aircraft configuration. Updated clamps installation. Updated Preparation topic. Added instructions to check and adjust the rod assem- blies. Editorial update on installation instructions. TASK 21-60-00-700-801-A/500 Updated procedure for CKPT and PASS CABIN tempera- ture selector in manual position. TASK 26-21-02-700-802-A/500 EFFECTIVITY: Removed reference to CMM TASK 26-21-02-200-801-A/600 Removed the description related the pressure indication which is related the charging. Data plate must be fol- lowed. TASK 26-22-01-200-801-A/600 Removed the description related the pressure indication which is related the charging. Data plate must be fol- lowed. TASK 27-11-00-200-801-A/600 Typo Correction TASK 27-12-03-040-801-A/400 Included step to install rigging pin before removal of ailer- on damper, and editorial correction TASK 27-12-03-440-801-A/400 Included step to remove rigging pin after installation of ai- leron damper, and editorial correction TASK 27-21-01-200-803-A/600 Typo correction TASK 27-25-00-700-801-A/500 Included a reference to the FIM TASK 27–22–00/301 in case of problems during the test TASK 27-40-00-700-802-A/500 Included information to energize the aircraft using APU TASK 27-40-02-600-801-A/300 EFFECTIVITY: Added oil (Radcolube NLT) as alternative TASK 27-51-01-700-801-A/500 Editorial correction in Access section replacing RH by LH in zone 5721 TASK 27-51-15-000-801-A/400 Included WARNING related to corrosion-inhibiting com- pound TASK 27-51-15-400-801-A/400 Included step to apply corrosion-inhibiting compound to the roller EMB-145 - AMM 1285 Page 2 of 4 HIGHLIGHTS Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SUBJECT DESCRIPTION TASK 28-11-00-700-805-A/500 EFFECTIVITY: All Revised the text of the table TASK 31-31-00-700-801-A/500 EFFECTIVITY: Added setup procedure for GSE 475 TASK 31-31-00-700-804-A/500 Added setup procedure for GSE 475 Updated the base test of Aircraft Type parameter from decimal to binary Updated the parameter name for the test of Aircraft Serial Number, from Aircraft Type to Aircraft Serial Number TASK 32-10-01-400-801-A/400 Delete step (20) Revise Figure reference and editorial changes Delete step (20) Revise Figure reference and editorial changes TASK 32-10-03-400-801-A/400 Included instruction to remove/install articulation nut TASK 32-10-07-400-801-A/400 Included information about torque for screws of the MLG door TASK 32-34-03-000-801-A/400 Included information to remove the teleflex-cable TASK 32-34-03-400-801-A/400 Included information to install the teleflex-cable TASK 32-49-02-400-801-A/400 Revised the range of torque wrench TASK 33-50-00-700-801-A/500 Removed step to do the functional test TASK 35-11-02-700-801-A/500 Updated procedure. Updated procedure. TASK 36-11-05-040-801-A/400 EFFECTIVITY: Updated procedure to remove an unnec- essary step TASK 36-12-03-000-803-A/400 Added step to clean the filter TASK 36-12-03-400-803-A/400 Updated the consumable list PAGE BLOCK 36-12-03/700 Added Pageblock: SERVO CONTROLLED BLEED AIR VALVE - CLEANING/PAINTING TASK 36-12-03-130-801-A/700 Added Task: APU-BLEED VALVE FILTER - CLEANING SUBJECT 38-32-09 Added Subject: TOILET-UNIT MOTOR PUMP FILTER EMB-145 - AMM 1285 Page 3 of 4 HIGHLIGHTS Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. TASK 51-21-03-100-801-A/700 Changed consumable materials information according to the vendor request (PCR 162897) TASK 53-12-01-000-801-A/400 Updated illustration. TASK 53-12-01-400-801-A/400 Updated illustration. TASK 53-12-02-000-801-A/400 Updated illustration. TASK 53-12-02-400-801-A/400 Updated illustration.
